content:
1843 , The Economist ’s sister magazine, is looking for a digital editor to cover maternity leave and work full time in our London office. This is an exciting opportunity to work at The Economist and to manage and develop its online editorial content.

We are looking for a dedicated journalist, and rigorous, Experienced copy-editor to help 1843 develop its online editorial strategy as well as manage The online publication schedule. You will be responsible for commissioning and editing articles, managing The title’s social-media accounts and producing weekly newsletters. You will work closely with The whole 1843 team, including The deputy digital editor, as well as The Economist ’s digital news team and design team. You will be an excellent editor with great attention to detail, with ideas about how to present material visually. Experience of working with an online CMS system is preferred.

To apply, please send a cover letter, CV, three ideas for stories that we could run on 1843magazine.com and a critique of the website to 1843digital@economist.com by August 6th.

The Economist Group values diversity. We are committed to equal opportunities and creating an inclusive environment for all our employees. We welcome applicants regardless of ethnic origin, national origin, gender, race, colour, religious beliefs, disability, sexual orientation or age.

ex: n. 八月
网络 威严的；奥古斯特；八月份
eg2: August Bank Holiday(= a public holiday on the last Monday in August in Britain)
八月银行假日（英国公共假日，八月最后一个星期一）

ex: n. （巴、印、俄、德）迭吉大乐（人名）
adj. (digital) 数字的；手指的
n. (digital) 数字；键
n. 经济学家，经济专家
v. 体会；体验；经历；感受
n. 体验；经历；实践；阅历
网络 经验；工作经验；工作经历
eg2: to have over ten years' teaching experience
有十多年教学经验
Do you have any previous experience of this type of work?
你以前干过这种工作吗？
a doctor with experience in dealing with patients suffering from stress
在治疗心理应激的病人方面很有经验的医生
My lack of practical experience was a disadvantage.
我缺少实际经验是个不利条件。
She didn't get paid much but it was all good experience .
她得到的报酬虽然不高，但有极好的体验。
He gained valuable experience whilst working on the project.
从事这项工程使他获得了宝贵的经验。
We all learn by experience .
我们都从经验中学习。
Experience has taught me that life can be very unfair.
经历使我懂得人生有时是很不公平的。
It is important to try and learn from experience .
努力从经验中学习是重要的。
In my experience , very few people really understand the problem.
据我的经验看，真正理解这个问题的人很少。
She knew from past experience that Ann would not give up easily.
她凭以往的经验知道安是不会轻易放弃的。
The book is based on personal experience .
本书是以个人经历为基础的。
direct/first-hand experience of poverty
对贫穷的直接╱亲身感受
an enjoyable/exciting/unusual/unforgettable, etc. experience
愉快、激动人心、异乎寻常、难以忘记等的经历
It was her first experience of living alone.
那是她第一次体验单独生活。
Living in Africa was very different from home and quite an experience(= unusual for us) .
生活在非洲完全不同于在家里，那真是一次不同寻常的经历。
I had a bad experience with fireworks once.
我放烟火有过一次不愉快的遭遇。
He seems to have had some sort of religious experience.
他似乎有某种宗教体验。
musical forms like jazz that emerged out of the Black American experience
诸如爵士乐这类起源于美国黑人传统的音乐形式
We lost a lot of money, but we just put it down to experience.
我们损失了很多钱，只当是吃一堑长一智了。
We lost a lot of money, but we just put it down to experience.
我们损失了很多钱，只当是吃一堑长一智了。
The country experienced a foreign currency shortage for several months.
这个国家经历了几个月的外汇短缺。
Everyone experiences these problems at some time in their lives.
每个人在人生的某个阶段都会经历这些问题。
to experience pain/pleasure/unhappiness
感受痛苦╱愉快╱不幸
I experienced a moment of panic as I boarded the plane.
我上飞机时曾一度感到恐慌。

ex: n. 组；集团；群；类
v. 成组；将…分类；把…分组
网络 群组；团体；小组
eg2: a group of girls/trees/houses
一群姑娘；一片树林；一排房子
A group of us is/are going to the theatre this evening.
我们有一帮人今晚要去看戏。
Students stood around in groups waiting for their results.
学生们成群地站在周围等待成绩。
The residents formed a community action group.
居民组成了社区行动组。
English is a member of the Germanic group of languages
英语是日耳曼语族中的一种语言。
The proportion of single parent families varies between different income groups.
单亲家庭比例在不同收入群中各不相同。
a minority group
少数群体
ethnic groups
族群
a group activity(= done by a number of people working together)
小组活动
She asked her students to get into groups of four.
她让学生每四人分为一小组。
to work in groups
分组工作
a newspaper group
报业集团
the Burton group
伯顿集团
the group sales director
集团销售董事
She sings in a rock group.
她是摇滚乐队的歌手。
The children grouped themselves around their teacher.
孩子们聚集在老师周围。
We all grouped around the tree for a photograph.
我们全体围着这棵树照了张相。
The colleges grouped together to offer a wider range of courses.
这些学院联合在一起，以开设范围更广的课程。
The books are grouped together by subject.
这些书按科目分类。
Contestants were grouped according to age and ability.
参赛者按年龄和能力分组。

ex: art. 这；那

ex: n. 申请人，申请者；请求者
eg2: This applicant is by far the better than that one.
这个申请者远比那一个好。
But the college has seen more than one male  “sit back on the couch, sometimes with their eyes closed, while their mom tells them where to go and what to do.
但是，在大学里不止会看到一两个男性申请人“靠在椅子上，有时候还闭着眼，悠闲自得。 有时候还要他妈妈告诉他该去哪，该做什么。
One such questionnaire shall be presented to each .
每位申请人均将得到这样一份问卷。

ex: adv. 紧密地；接近地；严密地；亲近地

wp.closely connected: 接近地连接;有密切关系

wp.Positive Critique: 建设性批判;建设性批评;性批判
wp.feminist critique: 女权主义批判;女性主义批评;女权批评
wp.Lucas Critique: 卢卡斯批判;卢卡斯批评;卢卡斯评论

ex: n. 批评；评论文章
vt. 批判；评论
eg2: This is an essential part of the  of structuralism.
这是结构主义评论的必不可少的一部分。
Which is true, to a certain extent.But the problem with the no limit perspective is that it avoids criticism because every critique is labeled as a “limitation.
在一定程度上，这是正确的，但不存在限制这一观点引发的问题是，它避免了批评，因为每个批判都是黏上“限制”标签的。
I am keeping my , because the site did feature the bad design for more than a year — and in any case you can still learn from their mistake, even after they [partly] fixed it.
我还是保留我的批评，因为这个愚蠢的设计他们用了长达一年之久 --- 无论如何就算在他们对它进行了“部分的”修改之后，你仍能从他们的错误中学到东西。

wp.Dedicate Server: 独享服务器;专用服务器

ex: vt. 致力；献身；题献
eg2: She vowed to herself that she would  her life to scientific studies.
她默默地发誓要献身于科学研究。
They take ownership of compatibility issues we raise and  effort to seeing them through.
他们具有我们所说的兼容性问题，并且正致力于解决这些问题。
As young people search for meaning in their lives, their minds are often open to all possible choices about what to believe, how to live, and what—if anything—to  themselves to.
当年轻人探索他们的生命意义时，他们的心灵往往向一切可能的选择敞开，像是关于信仰什么，如何生活，以及——如果一定要这样说的话——为了什么而献身。

具有严重学习障碍的人

wp.individual diversity: 个体差;生长发育的个体差异

ex: n. 多样性；差异
eg2: Thus, they have few clues as to why this diversity exists.
这样，他们对于这多样性存在的线索知道很少。
A world of peace and solidarity can only be accomplished by acknowledging and celebrating our .
只有承认和颂扬我们的多样性，才能实现一个和平与团结的世界。
They help us grasp the diversity of life on the planet.
这些标本有助于我们把握地球生命的多样性。

wp.inclusive finance: 普惠金融;包容性金融;普惠制金融
wp.inclusive OR: 可兼的逻辑或;或;可兼或
wp.inclusive a: 包括一应费用在内的;首末日包括在内的;包括的

ex: adj. 包括的，包含的
eg2: This process should be  of all departments and all situations.
此过程应该包括所有部门和所有的情况。
As a convenience, I use the term "mechanism," as in the phrase "governance mechanism" to be all- of the components identified above.
为了方便起见，如在短语“治理机制”中一样，我使用术语“机制”来包括上面所识别的所有组成部分。
Obviously, if "ashtray" or "painting" belongs in home furnishings, then it certainly belongs in the bigger, more  combined category too.
显然，如果“烟灰缸”或“油画”属于家居用品，那么它们当然属于一个大的包含更多的分类中。

ex: n. 怀孕；母亲身份

网络 母性；孕妇装；产科

a maternity ward/hospital(= one where women go to give birth to their babies)
产科病房；妇产医院

ex: n. 时事通讯

ex: n. 方向；定向；适应；情况介绍
eg2: How should I choose the  of my curves?
我应该怎样选择曲线的方向呢？
The winding trail caused us to lose our .
迂回曲折的小道使我们迷失了方向。
We need to avoid these spurious 0,0 readings, as about one out of every 10 readings at any  of the sensor will be 0,0 -- invalid data, indeed.
需要避免这些虚假的 0,0 读数，来自传感器各个方向上的每 10 个读数中就会有一个读数是 0,0 —— 无效的数据，确实如此。

ex: adj. 严格的，严厉的；严密的；严酷的

wp.Rigorous study: 严谨的学风;严密的研究

eg2: Our teacher is so  that he seldom lets up on us.
我们的老师很严格，他很少放松对我们的要求。
Migration is just a part of that lifecycle process, and therefore should involve rigorous testing at each stage of the project.
迁移仅仅只是生命周期过程中的一部分，因此严格的测试应该包括在项目的各个阶段当中。
The focus was on learning how to think critically, do research, communicate and improve writing skills, all in preparation for a rigorous high school curriculum.
注意力在于学习如何批判性地思考，做调查研究，沟通和提高写作技巧，所有都是为严密的高校课程做准备。

wp.flighting schedule: 起伏式;升沉式;间歇型;式排期

wp.tight schedule: 排得紧紧的时间表;日程安排;时间很紧;日程很紧
wp.delivery schedule: 交货计划表;落货排期;		交货时间表;交货打算表
wp.process schedule: 进度时间表;进程调度;过程时间表
wp.flight schedule: 航班时间表;航行时刻表;航班查询;航班时刻表

ex: vt. 安排，计划；编制目录；将……列入计划表
n. 时间表；计划表；一览表
eg2: Let me menu the travel  for next week.
让我来编下周的旅行安排。
A tight  means we can't delay any longer.
一张紧凑的时间表表明我们不能再耽搁。
Especially since I work from home and I have no ….I work when I want to work.
尤其是当我在家工作的时候，我没有时间表...。 我在自己想工作的时候工作。

ex: v. 坐（sit的第三人称单数形式）

Title: Digital editor, 1843 (maternity cover, London)
